Name: We Are Live
About the game: Features Travel through 4 randomly generated acts in order to find the origin of your creation! Dynamically create spells with resources obtained from defeating enemies. Create the ultimate damage spell, poison damage over time effect, or an extremely defensive spell! Obtain passive artifact effects guiding the strategies you employ. From multi-hit effects to the ability to over-heal your characters, the possibilities are endless! Control different characters each with their own specialties, in traditional JRPG fashion. PERMADEATH! Experience a unique playthrough each time, with very little effects carrying over between runs! Current Content 50+ artifact passive effects. 75+ hand-crafted rooms, used for randomly generating each run! 25+ unique combat encounters. An infinite number of unique spell combinations! Interact with a cast of characters to find out exactly why you were created. Story Waking up at the bottom of a cave with no memories, Elf must figure out the reason for her creation, and how the world became the way it has. The mysterious Sei is the only hint to how you ended up here.
